content: elevate your hydration game with this stylish water bottle sling crochet pattern perfect for on-the-go crafters this easy-level project fits an average 16 oz water bottle snugly and securely the seamless construction and worked-in-the-round design make for a quick and enjoyable crochet experience the pattern includes detailed written instructions and helpful photo tutorials to guide you every step of the way whether you choose the vibrant panda cotton print the versatile longmeadow or add a touch of sparkle with metallic blending filament this pattern allows for endless customization options to match your personal style stay hydrated in style with this practical and fashionable water bottle sling **unique features-** easylevel crochet pattern fits an average 16 oz water bottle seamless construction worked in the round design detailed written pattern with photo tutorial **materials needed-** panda cotton print yarn fingering weight 70 yards longmeadow yarn dk weight 70 yards metallic blending filament yarn thread weight stitch marker hook 3 75mm us size 5 0 gauge row = 4 inches
